docs.title: Databricks Deep Dive — Lakehouse Patterns, DLT & SQL
docs.text:
What this page covers

A pragmatic reference you can skim during interviews or reuse in projects: ingestion → quality → medallion modeling → governance → performance → cost. All examples are SQL-first with quick Python tabs where useful.

docs.title: TL;DR Architecture (Medallion + Governance)
docs.text: ```mermaid flowchart LR subgraph Sources A1[Batch files (CSV/Parquet)]:::src A2[Kafka/Kinesis]:::src A3[DB CDC]:::src end subgraph Ingestion B1[Auto Loader]:::ing B2[COPY INTO]:::ing B3[Streaming Reads]:::ing end subgraph Bronze C1[Raw Delta Tables]:::bronze end subgraph Silver D1[Cleaned + Conformed]:::silver end subgraph Gold E1[Aggregates & Marts]:::gold end subgraph Governance UC[Unity Catalog: Catalog/Schema/Table, ACLs, Lineage, Tags]:::gov end A1 --> B1 --> C1 --> D1 --> E1 A2 --> B3 --> C1 A3 --> B2 --> C1 UC -. manages .- C1 UC -. manages .- D1 UC -. manages .- E1 classDef src fill:#eef,stroke:#99f classDef ing fill:#efe,stroke:#5b5 classDef bronze fill:#f3f3f3,stroke:#999 classDef silver fill:#e5f6ff,stroke:#39f classDef gold fill:#fff5cc,stroke:#fc0 classDef gov fill:#ffe5f2,stroke:#f39
